subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Catcher Yadier Molina, 31, is a defensive and offensive star, but his handling of the Cardinals’ young pitchers has made him indispensable to the team’s success.
snippet: Catcher Yadier Molina, 31, is a defensive and offensive star, but his handling of the Cardinals’ young pitchers has made him indispensable to the team’s success.
